quoteText:
By creating an account or using our Services, you confirm that you accept these Terms. You also confirm that:

    1. 1. You have reached the age of 18. or
    2. 2. You are 13 or older but younger than 18 (“Minor”), and you represent that you have reviewed these Terms with your parent or legal guardian before using the Services and that you and your parent or guardian understand and consent to these Terms.
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
